statements: SELECT * FROM customer_information;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_information;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customer_information ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customer_information WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customer_information WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM customer_information WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_information WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM customer_information WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT customer_name FROM customer_information WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customer_information ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date ASC
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 3 ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 3 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, total_amount FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE name LIKE '%Smith%' AND phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 5 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE target_audience = 'New Customers';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, email, phone FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id, name FROM customers LEFT JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, target_audience FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-06-01' AND end_date > '2022-07-01';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_name, email, order_date, total_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, price FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id JOIN products ON orders.order_id = products.product_id;
SELECT customer_name, city, state, postal_code FROM customers JOIN addresses ON customers.customer_id = addresses.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 0 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 AND order_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE first_name = 'John'
SELECT customer_id, first_name, email FROM customers WHERE last_name = 'Doe'
SELECT first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com'
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
